channel.title: Client help
channel.description:
How do i add godsword specials and dragon claws to my client? If you could give me a tut it would be great, this is for 317 delta based, dont know if delta really matters though.
OH, and believe me, if you tell me to look at other tuts, i have been working on this for around 5 hours yesterday and about 4 hours today with no luck from all the other tutorials out there, so please help me if you can.
thank you. :)
